meanings.definition: The art or process of making baskets.
meanings.sent1: She learned the skill of basketwork from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The basketwork on display at the craft fair was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent3: The basketwork class was so popular that they had to add extra sessions.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in basketwork knew no bounds, turning simple materials into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The intricate basketwork designs seemed to come to life, telling stories through each weave.

meanings.sent1: The storage room was filled with basketwork of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors selling colorful basketwork.
meanings.sent3: The basketwork piled high in the corner made the room look like a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The basketwork woven by the villagers held the promise of a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent5: The basketwork overflowed with fruits and flowers, a vibrant display of nature's abundance.
